content.title: Shell App
content.information:
The new Shell App is designed to help you to get more out of driving, and to give you Shell information and personalised special offers at your fingertips:
· Use the app to receive special offers, check your balance and your Shell loyalty card transactions for any Shell loyalty card. You can also see how you can spend your loyalty points.
· It can help keep you on top of your vehicle’s maintenance – use reminder service to receive alerts when your vehicle’s tax, servicing, insurance or annual check-up are due.
· Our route planner is designed to help you find the best way to your destination and to estimate the cost of your journey.
· The station locator shows your nearest Shell service station to help you fill up with ease once our on the road. You can also see information on Shell highlights and products.
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id484782414?mt=8

content.title: Retail Voice of Customer (VOC)
content.information:
The SMG Reporting App provides easy, one-click access to the Retail Voice of Customer (VOC) scores, customer comments, and the ability to close the loop on customer complaints.
